name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a highly motivated Senior Electrical Engineer with 8 years of experience, I bring a strong foundation in condition-based monitoring and predictive maintenance, essential for ensuring optimal performance of **HV motors**, **HV transformers**, and **HV switchgear** systems. My skills extend to **LV switchgear** and electrical drives, enabling the design and implementation of efficient solutions tailored for high-voltage applications. I excel in leveraging exceptional communication, interpersonal, and influencing skills to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, ensuring the successful delivery of projects with utmost responsibility.
In addition to my engineering expertise, I have a solid background in full-stack development, utilizing technologies like **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** to create high-performance solutions. My experience includes building platforms leveraging %React%, %Next.js%, %Vue%, %Node.js%, %FastAPI%, and %Django%, coupled with cloud support in **Azure** and **AWS**. I have led initiatives that harness AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and real-time data processing while adhering to compliance standards.
